title: Issue with Install for Atom
body:
I get the following error message whenever I try to run a .do file in Atom.

> Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\Users\Samuel Leone\Anaconda3\lib\runpy.py", line 183, in _run_module_as_main mod_name, mod_spec, code = _get_module_details(mod_name, _Error) File "C:\Users\Samuel Leone\Anaconda3\lib\runpy.py", line 142, in _get_module_details return _get_module_details(pkg_main_name, error) File "C:\Users\Samuel Leone\Anaconda3\lib\runpy.py", line 109, in _get_module_details import(pkg_name) File "C:\Users\Samuel Leone\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel__init__.py", line 5, in from .kernel import StataKernel File "C:\Users\Samuel Leone\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\kernel.py", line 8, in from PIL import Image File "C:\Users\Samuel Leone\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\PIL\Image.py", line 93, in from . import _imaging as core ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

I have tried the troubleshooting steps in #276, but unfortunately they have not worked for me.

Note: I have Python 3.7 (through the Anaconda distribution), Stata 15, and Windows 10.

Thank you very much for any guidance you can provide!
